result.execSummary:
The defendant Travis Russell Ratliff was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Fail/Report to County Jail (10 Days +), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.425(1m)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Defendant is eligible for Huber and Good Time Credit. Time Served Sentence.
Consecutive to: Any other sentence

Costs to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Travis Russell Ratliff

records.addlTxt: Case called @ 10:20 AM: Defendant Travis Russell Ratliff in court, in custody.  Attorney Morgan Rae in court for Travis Russell Ratliff.  Attorney Matthew Leusink in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant advised of potential punishment.  Plea QN reviewed w/Defendant. Charges clarified by the Court. Based upon motion of the State, the Court amends Count 1 to Wis. Stat. 946.425(1m)(b) with the Repeater Enhancer dismissed. Plea colloquy entertained. Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed. Plea: Count 1 - NC. Repeater enhancer dismissed. Court accepts plea and enters JOC. Count 2 - DRI. Sentencing argument by DA Leusink. Sentencing argument by Atty Rae. Statement by DE. Court orders: 30 days WC Jail, consecutive to any other sentence. Huber, GT. 30 days CFTS, time served sentence. Costs w/ 60 DTP or PP. Appeal rights given.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 28, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Request for Plea and Sentencing hearing

Case called @ 2:28 PM Defendant Travis Russell Ratliff in court, in custody.  Attorney Morgan Rae appeared by phone for Travis Russell Ratliff.  Attorney Dennis J Ryan in court for State of Wisconsin. Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and potential punishment.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived. The Court entertains wavier of the preliminary hearing. The Court accepts voluntary waiver of the preliminary hearing. Defendant BOT. Information filed. Receipt admitted - Reading waived.  NGP entered.  Motion for modification of bond filed by Atty Rae. Argument by Atty Rae. Argument by ADA Ryan. The Court will order modification of the bond to a $5000 Signature bond for the defendant to attend treatment. The bond will immediately revert back to the $3000 Cash Bond in the event that the defendant is no longer in treatment. Atty Rae to prepare order. STC Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State.
Status conference scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 09:30 am.
